sentences.en: Did you manage to speak to the bursar about my salary?
sentences.cn: 关于我的薪金问题,你是否已经向会计疏通过?

sentences.en: I work in bursar's office at Columbia.
sentences.cn: 我在哥伦比亚大学的财务处工作.

sentences.en: I work in the bursar's office at Columbia.
sentences.cn: 我在哥伦比亚大学财务处上班. ”

sentences.en: Inquiries about grants or scholarships should be to the College Bursar.
sentences.cn: 申请补助金和奖学金者请把信寄给大学会计员.

sentences.en: Non - resident students who wish to lunch in should inform the Bursar before ten o'clock.
sentences.cn: 走读生凡拟在校用午餐者希于10时前通知总务管理员,今天你在家吃午饭还是出去吃饭?

sentences.en: Non - resident students who wish to lunch in should inform the Domestic Bursar before nine o'clock.
sentences.cn: 走读生凡拟在校用午餐者希于9时前通知校内总务管理员.

sentences.en: We have three children. I work in bursar's office at Columbia.
sentences.cn: 我们有三个孩子. 我在哥伦比亚大学的财务处工作.

sentences.en: We have three children. I work in the bursar's office at Columbia.
sentences.cn: 我们有三个孩子, 我在哥伦比亚的会计员办公室工作.

words.tran_cn: 财务办公室；大学奖学金
财务主管；会计员；领取奖学金的学生

trans.tran_cn: （大学等的）财务主管，奖学金获得者
trans.tran_en: someone at a school or college who deals with the accounts and office work
